name: Minimalist TUAW
description:
A quick style I did to make TUAW less ugly :)
More coming soon...

NOTE: It only does the homepage right now. The articles are coming later.
css: dd,blockquote{margin-left:1em;}textarea{font-size:1.2em;font-family:"lucida grande", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;height:180px;width:300px;}ol,ul,ul li{list-style:none;}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;margin-bottom:1.4em;}blockquote,q{quotes:none;}del{text-decoration:line-through;}iframe{margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}body{line-height:1.5;font-size:.8em;font-family:"lucida grande", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;background:#333;color:#444;text-align:center;font-variant:small-caps;margin:0;}html > body{font-size:12px;}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-family:"myriad pro", "lucida grande", "trebuchet ms", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;color:#111;clear:both;}h1{font-size:3em;}h2{font-size:2em;}h3{font-size:1.5em;line-height:2;}h4{font-size:1.2em;line-height:1.25;font-weight:700;}h5{font-size:1em;font-weight:700;}p{text-align:left;margin:0 0 1.5em;}p.last{margin-bottom:0;}p img.left{float:left;margin:1.5em 1.5em 1.5em 0;padding:0;}ul,ol{margin:0 0 10px 1.5em;}ol{list-style-type:decimal;}dl{margin:1.5em 0;}a{color:#07273b;text-decoration:none;outline:none;-webkit-transition:color .2s linear;}blockquote{color:#666;font-style:italic;margin:1.5em 0 1.5em 1.5em;}pre{margin-bottom:1.3em;background:#eee;border:0.1em solid #ddd;padding:1.5em;}code{font:0.9em Monaco, monospace;}hr{background:#ddd;color:#ddd;clear:both;float:none;width:100%;height:0.1em;border:none;_margin:0 0 1.2em 0;margin:1em 0 1.4em;}p.small{font-size:0.8em;margin-bottom:1.875em;line-height:1.875em;}p.large{font-size:1.2em;line-height:2.5em;}p.quiet{color:#666;}p.sponsored{background:#ffe;font-size:.9em;line-height:1.4em;margin:0 0 3px;padding:12px;}#content .carousel{border-bottom:1px solid #eee;width:50px;_display:inline;position:relative;z-index:0;height:600px;background-color:#fffeff;display:none;margin:0 0 2em 700px;padding:6px;}#content .carousel ul{width:600px !important;height:600px;display:inline;margin:0;padding:0;}#content .carousel li{width:50px;list-style:none;color:#FFF;position:relative;display:inline;height:600px;margin:0;}#content .carousel img{position:relative;border:0;height:88px;z-index:1;-webkit-border-radius:10px;-moz-border-radius:10px;border-radius:10px;margin:0;}#content .carousel .credit{color:#ccc;font-size:9px;text-align:right;display:block;width:120px;margin:88px 0 0;padding:2px 0;}#content .carousel h4{position:relative;text-align:left;font-size:1.1em;font-weight:400;width:134px;margin:4px 0 0;}#content .carousel li h4 a{font-weight:400;line-height:1.2em;display:block;_height:1%;padding:0;}#content .carousel li:hover h4 a{text-decoration:none;color:#172640;display:block;_height:1%;padding:0;}* html #content .carousel h4 a:hover{text-decoration:none;color:#172640;line-height:1em;display:block;_height:1%;padding:0 0 21px;}#content a.previous{position:absolute;top:-4px;left:0;height:0 !important;width:50px;background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.engadget.com/media/carousel-arrow-lt.png) no-repeat 0 40%;color:#FFF;z-index:1000;overflow:hidden;display:none;padding:219px 0 0;}* html #content .carousel a.previous{background-image:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.engadget.com/media/carousel-arrow-lt.gif);}#content .carousel a.previous:hover{background-position:-85px 40%;}#content .carousel a.next{position:absolute;top:-4px;right:-10px;height:0 !important;width:50px;background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.engadget.com/media/carousel-arrow-rt.png) no-repeat -101px 40%;color:#FFF;z-index:1000;overflow:hidden;display:none;padding:219px 0 0;}* html #content .carousel a.next{background-image:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.engadget.com/media/carousel-arrow-rt.gif);}#content .carousel a.next:hover{background-position:-16px 40%;}body -28px;_background:transparent;width:982px;text-align:left;margin:0 p{color:#666;font-size:.9em;margin-bottom:.75em;}.post{margin:.3em 0 4em;padding:0;}.post ul,.post ol{margin:.7em 2.5em;}#content #sailthru-submit:hover{background-color:#286da4;cursor:pointer;display:none;}#sailthru-signup input{border:solid 1px #ccc;-moz-border-radius:12px;-webkit-border-radius:12px;border-radius:12px;width:160px;display:none;margin:0;padding:5px;}#sailthru-response p{margin-top:1em;margin-bottom:0;display:none;}.aol-share-print{background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.tuaw.com/media/aol-share.gif) 0 0 no-repeat !important;}.aol-share-facebook{background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.tuaw.com/media/aol-share.gif) 0 -38px no-repeat !important;}.aol-share-lifestream{background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.tuaw.com/media/aol-share.gif) 0 -95px no-repeat !important;}.aol-share-email{background:url(http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.tuaw.com/media/aol-share.gif) 0 -19px no-repeat !important;}#content div.post div.postbody p.continueReading a{padding-top:10px;margin-top:10px;}#content div.post{border-bottom:1.5px dotted #b4b3b4;}html,body,form,fieldset,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,pre,blockquote,ul,ol,dl,address,#bloggerBio *,#thankYou *,#content .post .roundup ul.pod,#writers-promo *{margin:0;padding:0;}a img,:link img,:visited img,label input{border:0;}input,select,textarea,h6{font-size:1em;}form label,.trigger{cursor:pointer;}fieldset,#GH_ .GH_nav_list_UL .GH_nav_A_last,div.poll{border:none;}:focus,#content .carousel a{outline:0;}ins,#footer a:link,#footer a:visited,#footer a:hover,#footer a:active,#sortlinks a,#content .sponsored h3 a{text-decoration:none;}p img.top,#writers-promo h3{margin-top:0;}dl dt,strong,th,#cmtmain label,#replyindicator{font-weight:700;}a:hover,#GH_ .GH_hat_A:hover,#GH_ #GH_more_list a:hover,.sponsorArea .body .sponsorPromo .title a:hover,.sponsorArea .body .sponsorPromo .link a:hover,h3 .blogname a:hover,#writers-promo .writer-info h4 a:hover{text-decoration:underline;}em,#content .searchresults h2 h2.breadcrumb a{color:#3399d9;}#footer .searchform ul li.selected a,#footer .searchform ul li:hover a,#subcontent dd em,#grid2 strong,#thankYou em{color:#000;}#content .post h2,#content td.statsclass1,table.data tr td.statsclass2{background-color:transparent;}ul .statsclass1,ul .statsclass2{padding:5px 0 !important;}#contentform p,.clear{clear:both;}.featuredgalleries .thumb
